title: Hamas Releases New Video Of Israeli Hostage Held For More Than 420 Days
content: The armed wing of Hamas, the Ezzedine al-Qassam Brigades, released a video on Saturday of an Israeli hostage held in the Gaza Strip since the Hamas attack of October 2023.
summary: The armed wing of Hamas, the Ezzedine al-Qassam Brigades, released a video on Saturday of an Israeli hostage held in the Gaza Strip since the Hamas attack of October 2023.

title: Google CEO Sundar Pichai Says Search Will "Change Profoundly" In 2025
content: Mr Pichai also responded to Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella's earlier comment that Google should have been the "default winner" in the AI race.
summary: Mr Pichai also responded to Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella's earlier comment that Google should have been the "default winner" in the AI race.

title: "End Of Era Of Tyranny": Bashar Al-Assad Flees Syria As Rebels Move In
content: Syrian President Bashar al-Assad boarded a plane and left for an unknown destination, two senior army officers told Reuters.
summary: Syrian President Bashar al-Assad boarded a plane and left for an unknown destination, two senior army officers told Reuters.

title: Man Jailed For 10 Years Over Woman's Death At 'Slapping Therapy' Camp In UK
content: Danielle Carr-Gomm, 71, died after she stopped taking her insulin medication at Hongchi Xiao's insistence.
summary: Danielle Carr-Gomm, 71, died after she stopped taking her insulin medication at Hongchi Xiao's insistence.

title: Live Updates: Syrian Prime Minister Says 'Ready For Any Handover Process'
content: Syria War Live Updates: Syrian rebels announced full control of Homs, the third main city in the nation, and are on their way toward Damascus.
summary: Syria War Live Updates: Syrian rebels announced full control of Homs, the third main city in the nation, and are on their way toward Damascus.

title: Syrian Rebels Enter Damascus, US Fears President Assad's Chemical Weapons
content: Syrian rebel forces claim to have made inroads, bringing them closer to the heart of the capital Damascus, the seat of President Bashar al-Assad's power. The swift advance has plunged Assad's regime into its most precarious position.
summary: Syrian rebel forces claim to have made inroads, bringing them closer to the heart of the capital Damascus, the seat of President Bashar al-Assad's power. The swift advance has plunged Assad's regime into its most precarious position.

title: FBI Offers $50,000 Reward In Hunt For UnitedHealthcare CEO's Killer
content: New York's mayor said Saturday "the net is tightening" on the man suspected of gunning down a top health insurance executive before fleeing the city.
summary: New York's mayor said Saturday "the net is tightening" on the man suspected of gunning down a top health insurance executive before fleeing the city.

title: As War In Syria Rages On, Hezbollah Withdraws Forces From Homs, Damascus
content: Hezbollah is pulling its forces from the outskirts of the Syrian capital Damascus and the Homs area, a source close to the Lebanese group said.
summary: Hezbollah is pulling its forces from the outskirts of the Syrian capital Damascus and the Homs area, a source close to the Lebanese group said.

title: South Korea's Ex-Defence Minister Arrested Over Martial Law Fiasco
content: South Korea's former defence minister Kim Yong-hyun has been arrested over his role in a martial law declaration that plunged the country into turmoil, local media reported Sunday.
summary: South Korea's former defence minister Kim Yong-hyun has been arrested over his role in a martial law declaration that plunged the country into turmoil, local media reported Sunday.

title: Anti-Israel Students Launch 'Columbia Intifada' Newspaper At US University
content: Since the October 7 Hamas attacks and the subsequent response by Israel, Columbia University has been the epicentre for disruptive protests.
summary: Since the October 7 Hamas attacks and the subsequent response by Israel, Columbia University has been the epicentre for disruptive protests.

title: Elon Musk A Surprise Guest At Notre Dame Reopening In Paris
content: Elon Musk, the world's richest man and one of Donald Trump's closest allies, made a surprise appearance Saturday at the ceremony marking the re-opening of Notre Dame Cathedral in Paris.
summary: Elon Musk, the world's richest man and one of Donald Trump's closest allies, made a surprise appearance Saturday at the ceremony marking the re-opening of Notre Dame Cathedral in Paris.

title: Notre Dame Reopens Five Years After Fire
content: The archbishop of Paris re-opened Notre Dame cathedral on Saturday by symbolically knocking on the doors and entering the 12th-century landmark which has been restored after a devastating fire in 2019.
summary: The archbishop of Paris re-opened Notre Dame cathedral on Saturday by symbolically knocking on the doors and entering the 12th-century landmark which has been restored after a devastating fire in 2019.

title: Syrian Rebels Say They Have Encircled Capital; Russia, Trump Weigh In
content: Rebels on a lightning advance through Syria said they were nearing the capital Damascus on Saturday, although the Bashar al-Assad government denied the army had withdrawn from areas around the city. The rebels claimed they had encircled the city.
summary: Rebels on a lightning advance through Syria said they were nearing the capital Damascus on Saturday, although the Bashar al-Assad government denied the army had withdrawn from areas around the city. The rebels claimed they had encircled the city.

title: 22 Terrorists, 6 Soldiers Killed During Security Operations In Pakistan
content: At least 22 terrorists were eliminated while six soldiers were killed during three separate operations over two days in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province in northwestern Pakistan, media wing of the army said on Saturday.
summary: At least 22 terrorists were eliminated while six soldiers were killed during three separate operations over two days in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province in northwestern Pakistan, media wing of the army said on Saturday.

title: Trump, Zelensky, Macron Discuss "Crazy" World In Paris
content: French President Emmanuel Macron on Saturday hosted three-way talks with Ukrainian counterpart Volodymyr Zelensky and Donald Trump, discussing what the American president-elect termed a world that was a "little crazy".
summary: French President Emmanuel Macron on Saturday hosted three-way talks with Ukrainian counterpart Volodymyr Zelensky and Donald Trump, discussing what the American president-elect termed a world that was a "little crazy".

title: Is The 'Writing On The Wall' For Syria's Bashar al-Assad?
content: More than 13 years since Bashar al-Assad's security forces opened fire on protesters demanding democratic reforms, the Syrian president's grip on power may finally be weakening.
summary: More than 13 years since Bashar al-Assad's security forces opened fire on protesters demanding democratic reforms, the Syrian president's grip on power may finally be weakening.

title: 'Needle Moving Towards Negotiation': S Jaishankar On Russia-Ukraine War
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar gave a stern reply to the 'criticism' on India's purchase of Russian oil, while strongly asserting that the world is realising the need to be at the negotiating table to resolve Russia-Ukraine conflict.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar gave a stern reply to the 'criticism' on India's purchase of Russian oil, while strongly asserting that the world is realising the need to be at the negotiating table to resolve Russia-Ukraine conflict.

title: US Man Kills Son, Burns Body Before Telling Cops "It Was Horrible Accident"
content: A lawyer in the United States allegedly shot his 20-year-old son, burnt his body and then called the cops to tell them what he claimed was a "horrible accident".
summary: A lawyer in the United States allegedly shot his 20-year-old son, burnt his body and then called the cops to tell them what he claimed was a "horrible accident".

title: "Not Our Fight": Trump Says US Shouldn't Get Involved In Syria Conflict
content: President-elect Donald Trump said on Saturday the US should not be involved in the conflict in Syria, where rebel forces are threatening the government of President Bashar al-Assad.
summary: President-elect Donald Trump said on Saturday the US should not be involved in the conflict in Syria, where rebel forces are threatening the government of President Bashar al-Assad.

title: Syrian President's Father's Statue In A Main Square Toppled By Protesters
content: Protesters brought down the statue of the late father of Syrian President Bashar al-Assad in a main square in Jermana suburb, nearly ten kilometers from the centre of Damascus.
summary: Protesters brought down the statue of the late father of Syrian President Bashar al-Assad in a main square in Jermana suburb, nearly ten kilometers from the centre of Damascus.
